## ReadableProtocol interface

Read the state of the protocol.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ReadableProtocol 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [EthersSfStablecoin](./lib-ethers.etherssfstablecoin.md)<!-- -->.
